trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to a method.
trans-unit.target: 表示方法的參考。

trans-unit.source: A CodeMethodReferenceExpression can be used to represent an expression of the form Object.Method.
trans-unit.target: CodeMethodReferenceExpression 可用來表示表單 Object.Method 的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> property indicates the object that contains the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A>屬性會指出包含方法的物件。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.MethodName%2A> property indicates the name of the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.MethodName%2A>屬性表示的方法名稱。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.MethodName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A CodeMethodReferenceExpression is used with a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodInvokeExpression> to indicate the method to invoke, and with a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateCreateExpression> to indicate the method to handle the event.
trans-unit.target: CodeMethodReferenceExpression 搭配<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodInvokeExpression>表示的方法來叫用，且具有<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateCreateExpression>表示要處理事件的方法。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateCreateExpression> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodInvokeExpression>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref> class using the specified target object and method name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref>類別使用指定的目標物件和方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object to target.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，指出要目標的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to call.
trans-unit.target: 要呼叫的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref> class using the specified target object, method name, and generic type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref>類別使用指定的目標物件、 方法名稱和泛型型別引數。

trans-unit.source: The `typeParameters` parameter represents a collection of type references to be substituted for the type parameter references of the current generic method.
trans-unit.target: `typeParameters`參數代表用來取代目前泛型方法的型別參數參考的型別參考的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object to target.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，指出要目標的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to call.
trans-unit.target: 要呼叫的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> values that specify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.TypeArguments*> for this <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref>值，指定<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.TypeArguments*>這個<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"> </xref>。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.TypeArguments*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to reference.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要參考之方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method to reference.
trans-unit.target: 要參考的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression that indicates the method to reference.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定運算式，表示要參考的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that represents the method to reference.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，代表要參考的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type arguments for the current generic method reference expression.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前泛型方法參考運算式的類型引數。

trans-unit.source: The TypeArguments property represents a collection of type references to be substituted for the type parameter references of the current generic method.
trans-unit.target: TypeArguments 屬性表示用來取代目前泛型方法的型別參數參考的型別參考的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReferenceCollection"></xref> containing the type arguments for the current code <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReferenceCollection"> </xref>包含目前的程式碼的型別引數<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"> </xref>。
